DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate FOLFOX regimen versus LV5FU2 adjuvant treatment stage II III colon cancer . Primary objective : Disease Free Survival ( DFS ) Secondary objective : Overall Survival ( OS ) , safety ( include long term toxicity )
DOC.brief_title: MOSAIC - Multicenter International Study Oxaliplatin/ 5FU-LV Adjuvant Treatment Colon Cancer
DOC.criteria: Main selection criterion : Histologically proven stage Dukes `` B2 `` ( stage II : T3T4 N0 M0 ) `` C `` ( stage III : T N12 M0 ) colon carcinoma . The inferior pole tumor must peritoneal reflection ( > 15 cm anal margin ) · Complete resection primary tumor without gross microscopic evidence residual disease Treatment within 7 week follow surgery Age 1875 year old ECOG PS £ 2 No prior chemo , immuno radiotherapy
